page.title: 19Buxhall - The Village Hall
page.content: Buxhall Village Hall (the old school) is managed by a committee representing the organisations in the village. The hall has a small kitchen and capacity for 75 persons. It is used for a number of regular activities: {Toddler Group}(weekly);{Women's {Institute}(monthly);{Over 60s}(6 times a year);{Whist}(fortnightly);{Bingo}in aid of Football Club (monthly Sept to April);{Garden Club}(4 times a year). The Parish church uses it for the {annual parish party}and{auction of {produce}following Harvest Festival; {Suffolk Bell Ringers}meet there 3 times a year continuing the parish's strong tradition of ringing. The hall committee raises money for maintenance via hire charges and a weekly "Little Ernie" operating mainly in the village giving an income of Â£13 per week.
